What I Am ...

Using

  •  Coursera - for e-learning new knowledge
  •  Asana - for the management of my research projects
  •   Evernote - for fast saving my online hunting results
  •   Dropbox and -   ownCloud for the storage and synchronization of my data among computers
  •   ReadCube - for making notes in literatures
  •   Research Gate - for communicating with other researchers
  •   Feedly - for reading RSS
  •   DokuWiki - for storing and updating my scientific knowledge
  •   Hackpad    Workflowy and   Mural.ly - for brainstorming
  •   Geomagic Design 2014 - for 3D modeling
  •   Instapaper - for saving-it-for-later reading
  •   Penflip - for writing thesis draft
  •   Coffitivity - for enhancing my productivity during work (esp. reading & writing)
  •   f.lux - for protecting my eyes
